data.message: Leviticus 20:13 - If a man also lie with mankind, as he lieth with a woman, both of them have committed an abomination: they shall surely be put to death; their blood [shall be] upon them.

replies.message: Do you follow every last part of the Bible or only quote the sections that don't apply to you so it's easy to support those?
and hence forth you shalleth be known as an idiot, and forever burn in hell
Leviticus 19:27 "You shall not round the corners of your heads, neither shall you mar the corners of your beard."                               I guess you guys are skipping that one.
We are no longer bound to the laws in the Old Testament, it jus shows how God feels about the issue. There are verses against homosexuality in the New Testament, the laws of which we are under.
isnt the point of the bible more about love than to hurt another person?
so, the bible say, kill the gay people? that's cool! god loves us for sure!!!
Do you not realize all of the other things that are supposed to be against in your made up book.
If we all lived according 2 the bible there would be no fighting, no hate and i would be a millionaire 7 fold. I can only try.
Don't forget NO sex before marriage.
I read hundreds of times that line and it's always changed, even in other languages it says a completely different thing. everyone transforms it as they wish... liars.

keep barcking idiots. God is perfect, and he know what hes doing. R u idiots enaught to question God?  or to say what he wants? or he do? God make them in that way. and they can be religious too. stop bugging! we are all sons of the same God yeez!

"I do not permit a woman to teach or to exercise authority over a man; rather, she is to remain quiet." - 1 Timothy 2:12
Why don't you start practicing what you preach right now?
